project.description: This project used to publish playground-website-frontend-test ;【2021-11-30 created】

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: INPUT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: use default value for $INPUT before project;

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" IMAGE_VERSION=${INPUT} PROJECT_NAME="playground-website-frontend-test"
cd $WORKSPACE if [ -d "infra-common" ]; then rm -rf "infra-common" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-common cd infra-common/common-applications/test-environment/playground-webiste-frontend-test else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/playground/playground-app-test:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use kustomize to replace old playground manager image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "Update playground-app-test-image:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print $4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null
if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "sync file content to argocd completed!" else echo "sync file content to argocd failed!" fi
